title: Looking for a Ship
description: On one of the last American merchant ships, second mate Andy Chase and author board the S.S. Stella Lykes, captained by Paul McHenry Washburn. The 42-day journey down the Pacific coast of South America stops for freight at Cartagena, Balboa, Lima, and Guayaquil â€” notorious for pirates. The crew exchange tales of disaster, stupidity, greed, generosity, and courage.
author: John McPhee
